code: import React from'react';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import'./styles/Dashboard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const businesses=useSelector(state=>state.business.businesses);const balance=useSelector(state=>state.business.balance);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Welcome to the 90s Economic Strategy Game"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"balance",children:["Balance: ",balance," TON"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Businesses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"business-list",children:businesses.map((business,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/assets/images/".concat(business.name.toLowerCase().replace(/ /g,'-'),".png"),alt:business.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:business.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Profit: ",business.profit," TON"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Production Time: ",business.productionTime," minutes"]})]},index))})]});};export default Dashboard;
